comments:
Using I200406250010, I started a background checkout and then opened the debug 
launcher (choosing Debug.. from debug dropdown). I switched to the plugin tab 
and choose "" in order to see which plugins I had a source and which I didn't. 
I then closed the dialog (and chose not to save the changes). At some point, I 
got the following exception. The delta handler for te LaunchConfigurationView 
seems to assume that it is getting deltas in the main thread which is not 
always the case.

Looks like the background checkout had a ".launch" file in it. We are not 
handling this case. Deferred.

Fixed in LaunchConfigurationView. The launchAdded and launchRemoved methods now check if 
they're in the UI thread before updating the tree viewer. If they aren't, the updating code is put into an 
asynchExec. After talking to DarinS, we figured it was best to do the thread checking so as to 
maintain the current level of responsiveness when the user presses New or Delete.

Please verify, DW.

Verified. Also added a null check in the "handleChange" method to ensure the 
viewer has not been disposed between the time of the callback and the 
execution of the async exec.
